subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Rarely will any tournament fall into a final-round story line like the AT&T Pebble Beach National Pro-Am, which snapped into focus on a sharp, clear day on the Monterey Peninsula.
snippet: Rarely will any tournament fall into a final-round story line like the AT&T Pebble Beach National Pro-Am, which snapped into focus on a sharp, clear day on the Monterey Peninsula.
